home.title: LatVeneer
home.subtitle: A new veneer production facility in Latvia.

meta.description: LatVeneer – A new veneer production facility in Latvia. Supplying traceable birch veneer to European markets.
meta.ogDescription: We supply high-quality birch veneer from Latvia to Europe.

factory.title: Our Factory
factory.description: We can offer core birch veneer from two production lines 1300mm and 1600mm in length. Mainly producing the following sizes: 1300x1300; 1300x2600, 1600x1600, 1600x3100.

location.title: Where to find us
location.description: Our factory is located in the industrial park in Jēkabpils, Latvia.

what.title: What we do
what.description: We manufacture spindleless birch veneer mainly for plywood and molded plywood furniture manufacturers. Our primary market is in Europe, and we take great care to provide only traceable and responsibly sourced products of appropriate quality.

contact.title: Get in touch
contact.description: You can reach us using the details below.

procurement.title: Log Procurement
procurement.volumeText: Hand measurement according to under bark diameter as well as coefficient measurement is applied.
procurement.contact: For more information, please contact our procurement manager:
procurement.requirement1: Curvature per meter no more than 2 cm (within the cut)
procurement.requirement3: Minimal branching (no more than three branches per meter)
procurement.requirement4: Freshly sawn (staining logs are not suitable for production)
procurement.requirement5: Maximum diameter 40cm (if exceeded, then will be marked as defective)
